tool.name: Fastqc report
tool.description: Evaluate short reads with FastQC software on a single or a paired of untrimmed and trimmed reads files.

regex.description: Check the warnings_and_errors.txt file for more details.

param.name: reads_1
param.label: Short reads before trimming
param.help: Short reads data from history. This could be reads before trimming.

param.name: reads_2
param.label: Short reads after trimming
param.help: Short reads data from history. This could be reads after trimming.

param.name: contaminants
param.label: Contaminant list
param.help: Specifies a non-default file which contains the list of adapter sequences which will be explicitly searched against the library. The file must contain sets of named adapters in the form name[tab]sequence. Lines prefixed with a hash will be ignored.

param.name: limits
param.label: Submodule and Limit specifing file
param.help: Specifies a non-default file which contains a set of criteria which will be used to determine the warn/error limits for the various modules. This file can also be used to selectively remove some modules from the output all together. The format needs to mirror the default limits.txt file found in the Configuration folder.
